name: systema
description: A different kind of module loader

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:commonjs
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && (checkver lt 5.0.0 || rollup -c) && uglifyjs dist/umd/index.js -c -m > dist/umd/index.min.js
scripts.test: nyc --extension .ts npm run test:no-spec | tap-spec && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.test:no-spec: npm run build:test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/tape/bin/tape dist/test/test/**/*.test.js

author: Juha JÃ¤rvi
